law.text: Any person or party in interest aggrieved by the publication of the nonequivalent drug product formulary of the Board of Pharmacy shall be entitled to a judicial review in Franklin County Circuit Court.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 399, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 7.
